data.name: CATATONIC
data.detailed_description:
Escape the troubled mind of Katrina the Cat in CATATONIC, a suspense-adventure game set in Mobb Paw's New Marilyn City. Traverse frenzied alleyways and uncover its mysteries in a 1930s hand-drawn 2D style.

Game Features

• 2D side-scrolling gameplay
• Responsive 2D controls
• Explore the different worlds enclosed within Katrina's head
• Discover and put together clues to defeat bosses through pacifist means
• Frame by frame art style inspired by 1930s cartoons
• A unique blend of atmospheric ambience and jazz music

data.short_description: Escape the troubled mind of Katrina the Cat in CATATONIC, a suspense-adventure game set in Mobb Paw's New Marilyn City. Traverse frenzied alleyways and uncover its mysteries in a 1930s hand-drawn 2D style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
